title: Does Washington, D.C., have a memorial to "the fast shoes "? Representing 7,000 children killed by guns since Sandy Hawk?
subtitle: Seven thousand pairs of empty shoes displayed in the American Capitol were intended to represent child victims of gun violence since Sandy Hawk was shot.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A temporary memorial in the American Capitol shows a pair of empty shoes to illustrate 7,000 children killed with weapons since the shooting at Sandy Hawk Primary School in December 2012.
